title: Crafting question
body:
Bit late on the hextech crafting but I couldn't find an answer - I'm sure there is one somewhere though.

When combining shards, does rarity have anything to do with the result? Will 3 epic shards produce a better result (or increased chance) or does it make no difference?

Thanks!

replies.body:
as of now, no they don't. The Gems shown on the shards are just to inform you that these are "rare" skins.

the only thing that happens if you reroll a "good" skin and get crap is: "Essence will also be awarded if the resulting content is worth less than what was used to reroll."
Awesome, thanks for clearing that up
